:: Vamprah ::

Vamprah was inside her ship and she smirked sourlsly, it had=
 been a big delay not a mistake -but her time was ending. She knew that she=
 had to end with Zardus and other main leaders of that war before they arri=
ved. She had chosen her base according to her personal tasted and beast mod=
e: Inside the Earth. Her base was a bizarre vertion of the ark and her secr=
et was kept under ground... Ground always keeps creeps secrets.  A slim gap=
 was the entry and visitor had to fly several tunnels, most of them with de=
ad end, before they could find Vamprah's  den. 

Vamprah'd need several thi=
ngs to do before she challenged at Zardus, but she felt that would be a goo=
d idea send again her scout probes and a scout probe was sent to Arabian De=
sert...

After that Vamprah left Control Room and wents toward a door which=
 was set ship's stern, its open and showed several coffin-like shapes. They=
 were Predacon's protophorms that The Tripedacus Council had given her. Vam=
prah walk among them and stopped in front of one. Vamprah showed a special =
control and pushing a button a metal platform with few inches thick appeare=
d floating, it was a magnetig freight elevator. The machine araise the pod =
and followed at Vamprah to other room: Lab's ship.

The machine left carefu=
lly the pod and left the place.

"It's no good that femmes-bot live alone" =
smirked Vamprah while she was bringing closer other machine, it had three s=
upports, a small control pad and, in the top, a sort of container.

Vamprah=
 went o the pod and connected it with a conainer, after that she showed a s=
mall cristal box which contain an black scorpion, she set it in the contain=
er and pushed the buttons. Machine scan ADN and passed the information to t=
he pod.
